thread.title: Sharon DeSimone, EA, Lincoln Tax Services of RI
thread.title_full: DoItYourselfLettering.com reviewed by Sharon DeSimone, EA, Lincoln Tax Services of RI

author: Sharon DeSimone, EA, Lincoln Tax Services of RI
title: Sharon DeSimone, EA, Lincoln Tax Services of RI
text: I was told by a friend that lettering was expensive and that I could not do it myself with good results. I tried it anyway since I'm a new business with limited resources. I am so glad I did! Very reasonable prices, easy do-it-yourself instructions, great customer service, AND the most awesome results!
